Hi Michael, 
Thank you for your question. The City of Palo Alto has posted their Employee Recruitment, Orientation & Retention documents on the Knowledge Network. They are very comprehensive documents and I believe you will find them useful in creating your own rules of conduct and operation. 
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/303070/Capstone__Palo_Alto_CA__Employee_Recruitment_Orientation_Retention_Part_II

author: Michael Silvestri
text:
I am preparing a program for newly elected officials and would like to obtain some copies of rules of conduct/operation for elected bodies.  At the Phoenix conference there were a number of coummunities that idicated their local governing bodies have adopted some.  Any help would be appreciated.
Michael A. Silvestri
title: Governing Body Rules of operation
